title: #65: Niki Connor, The Holistic Vegan Chef - Inflammation, sleep routines, holistic recipes, and candida
itunes:title: #65: Niki Connor, The Holistic Vegan Chef - Inflammation, sleep routines, holistic recipes, and candida
description:
Holistic Vegan Chef & Health & Nutrition Counselor Niki Connor, joins Lauryn & Michael to discuss tips for preventing exhaustion & inflammation, why you should cut out chemically processed foods from your diet, the importance of creating a sleep routine, and Niki shares a recipe for making an at-home holistic smoothie. We also hear the trio talk about what candida is & the affects it can have on your body and Niki breaks down the basic science behind ayurveda and how it holistically relates to diet, the mind, body, & soul.

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE

This episode is brought to you by The Skinny Confidential Bombshell Body Guide and Meal plan. 

tired of combating inflammation & bloat? Want to feel lighter and sexier?

Check out lauryn’s latest 7 day meal plan.

In this simple & super effective plan you’ll find:

+ tsc grocery list with every ingredient you need for the 7 days.

+ what the f*ck to do when you love carbs guide.

+ quick and delicious recipes: breakfast, snacks, lunch, dinner and dessert.

You will also find 28 weeks worth of fat burning, muscle toning, 27 minute long, effective workouts you can do at home with no equipment.

USE PROMO CODE: HIMANDHER at Checkout for 20% Off
